title: 1.7.10的粒子效果
author: crfst99936484
txt_content: 1.7.10有没有办法生成一团会移动的粒子团，检测当玩家碰到时就会死亡

replies.author: MC深坑不回头
replies.txt_content:
1.12版:
生成一个小的隐形盔甲架并有特殊标签tagA，高频粒子效果命令使特定粒子生成在A上，另外设定tp盔甲架的移动路径。高频侦测该A附近一格的玩家就执行kill命令即可。
summon minecraft:armor_stand 6 7 8 {CustomName:" §aAAA",NoBasePlate:1b,ShowArms:0b,Small:1b,Invulnerable:1b,CustomNameVisible:1b,Invisible:0b,Tags:["test"]}

execute @e[type=armor_stand,tag=test,c=1] ~ ~ ~ particle reddust ~0.5 ~0 ~0.5 0 1 0 1

execute @p[score_time=10,score_time_min=10] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=test] 1 2 3
execute @p[score_time=20,score_time_min=20] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=test] 1 2 4
execute @p[score_time=30,score_time_min=30] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[tag=test] 1 2 5

execute @e[type=armor_stand,tag=test] ~ ~ ~ /kill @p[r=1]
